name: Super Hiper Mega Battles In Space
name_original: Super Hiper Mega Battles In Space
description:
Super Hiper Mega Battles In Space is a competitive local multiplayer game, inpired by games like GunMayhem or Achtung Die Kurve. Take control over a space ship and challenge your friends right now in one of three unique game modes:
- Standard
- The Killer Takes It All
- Last Man Standing.
So good luck, have fun and may the odds be ever in your favor.
